mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lost_items (id, description, lost_time, location, contact_info, created_at, status) VALUES (#{id}, #{description}, #{lostTime}, #{location}, #{contactInfo}, #{createdAt}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE lost_items SET description = #{description}, lost_time = #{lostTime}, location = #{location}, contact_info = #{contactInfo}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, description, lost_time, location, contact_info, created_at, status FROM lost_items ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT id, description, lost_time, location, contact_info, created_at, status FROM lost_items WHERE status = #{status} ORDER BY created_at DESC
